name: Please, No Soliciting
description:
Solicitors are coming to your house! Stop them before they make you sign a bunch of petitions!

Instructions Controls

Click and drag to throw a rock.

Press the 1, 2, and 3 keys select objects:
1. rock
2. throwable spike
3. bowling ball

Items 2 and 3 have a cooldown, which can be seen in the bottom right corner of the screen.

Scoring

You will gain 1 point every second, plus 5 points for every time you kill an enemy with spikes. Score is displayed in the top left of the screen.

Lives

Your lives are displayed in the top right. You will lose 1 life every time an enemy reaches the right side of the screen, but gain 3 lives every time a VIP enemy (the ones in tuxedos) reaches the goal. If you run out of lives, you lose.
